#summary User help

The main interface for now is makepage.py

{{{
[bsergean@amanda trunk]$ python makepage.py -h      
 
makepage.py : Export iPhoto library to html pages
usage : python makepage.py <options> AlbumName
OPTIONS | -d <dir> : FIXME does nothing
        | -h : display this text

OTHERS
        
DEPENDENCIES
        PIL, libjpeg, Cocaine

HISTORY
        Mathieu made this program a while ago, and put it in sourceforge
        a while after. Benjamin got rid of the CVS error messages, and put
        it on google code.
}}}

Here is a sample output from a simple use of pytof.

{{{
[bsergean@amanda trunk]$ python makepage.py Berkeley
Parsing AlbumData.xml   [DONE]
Writing pictures 100%   DONE
}}}
